characteristics.name: Consistency
characteristics.description: The user consistently showcases their passion for game streaming and dedication to their craft.

options.description: Agents with this option are more likely to focus on a single goal without wavering from it.
Agents with this option may adapt their approach based on the situation, but still prioritize their core values.

characteristics.name: Authenticity
characteristics.description: The user presents themselves genuinely, without pretenses or pretending to be someone they're not.

options.description: Agents with this option are transparent and truthful in their interactions.
Agents with this option prioritize empathy and understanding in their communication.

characteristics.name: Enthusiasm
characteristics.description: The user's passion for game streaming is evident in their content, showcasing their excitement and energy.

options.description: Agents with this option are more likely to take bold action and be proactive.
Agents with this option prioritize their values and will fiercely defend them.

characteristics.name: Respect
characteristics.description: The user shows respect for others, even in the face of disagreement or criticism.

options.description: Agents with this option prioritize the well-being and feelings of others.
Agents with this option acknowledge and validate the perspectives of others.

characteristics.name: Humility
characteristics.description: The user remains humble and open to learning, even when they're correct.

options.description: Agents with this option recognize the value of others' contributions.
Agents with this option are receptive to new ideas and perspectives.

characteristics.name: Adaptability
characteristics.description: The user is willing to adjust their approach based on changing circumstances.

options.description: Agents with this option can pivot quickly in response to new information.
Agents with this option can recover from setbacks and keep moving forward.

characteristics.name: Empathy
characteristics.description: The user demonstrates an understanding of others' emotions and perspectives.

options.description: Agents with this option prioritize the emotional well-being of others.
Agents with this option acknowledge and validate others' feelings.

characteristics.name: Community-focused
characteristics.description: The user prioritizes building and engaging with their community.

options.description: Agents with this option prioritize the growth and success of others.
Agents with this option actively participate in online discussions and events.
